description: Schengen Visitor Visa (Type C). Note: 'Attestation d’accueil' is mandatory for private visits.

meta.min_funds_requirement: Min. 120 EUR/day (No booking) or 65 EUR/day (with Hotel). Proof: Bank statements (3 months).

modify.description: Must be filled online at the official 'France-Visas' portal. The generated PDF must be printed and signed.

modify.note: For private visits (staying with family/friends), an original 'Attestation d’accueil' (proof of accommodation) obtained by the host from their local town hall is MANDATORY.

steps_flow.title: France-Visas Registration
steps_flow.description: Create an account on the official France-Visas website and complete the online application.

steps_flow.title: Book VFS Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a slot at the nearest VFS Global center for France.

steps_flow.title: Submit & Biometrics
steps_flow.description: Submit documents and provide biometrics at VFS.
